channel.title: Cache help please!
channel.description:
Right I am using ProjectEckov4 Source+Cache and I changed a few background images in the cache, and zipped all the folders and maincache dats or whatever they are called... i did this
[img]http://i53.tinypic.com/fjm87t.jpg[/img]
I then added to archive (.zip) named it GFC-v1.2.zip
i then put my cache link on my domain a.k.a http://www.MYDOMAIN.com/GFC-v1.2.zip (FAKE DOMAIN BECAUSE OTHERWISE THAT WOULD BE ADVERTISING)
I then put in my client cache loader think to load the cache from the same URL a.k.a http://www.MYDOMAIN.com/GFC-v1.2.zip
Right, this is what it looks like when someone downloads the cache via the auto webclient:
[img]http://i52.tinypic.com/iooumu.jpg[/img]
how do i fix and change the .ProjectEckov4 etc.
Id appreciate all help please:)
You could also contact me on Skype if you can't post for any reason @ GoodFightConnection <- (SkypeName)

item.title: Cache help please!
item.dc:creator: @GoodFightConnection GoodFightConnection
item.description:
@GoodFightConnection wrote:

inside client.java for client it has a line with the URL telling it to load the zip file, it doesnt work tho :S how would i add auto cache is thta what i have to do can u help me plz

Read full topic
